data.actual_result: Friend A stays in the original position.
data.expected_result: Friend A automatically gets moved to the new position.
data.short_description: After an user changes their username, they are left in the current position that they were in previously instead of the new position.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a server with multiple people. - Have Friend A to change their username to be on top of the server list or the bottom of the server list. - Observe your server member list.
